getBestMovies(int, double, int) - Method in class logic.MovieService

getGeotaggedTweets(int) - Method in class logic.MovieService
Find all tweets that are geotagged, i.e. have a "coordinates" attribute that is neither null nor non-existent.

getTaggedTweets() - Method in class logic.MovieService
Find all tweets that are geotagged, i.e. that have a "coordinates" attribute.
getTweetedMovies() - Method in class logic.MovieService
Find all movies that have a "tweets" attribute, i.e. that were at least once subject of a tweet.

getTweetsNear(double, double, int) - Method in class logic.MovieService

getViewableMovies() - Method in class logic.MovieService
